CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 7, 1956, pg. 17 reads: "...4. The Coca-Cola Bottling Company booth attracted thousands of thirsty homemakers including The Courier's W. Beverly Carter, publisher; Mrs. R. L. Vann, president, and two Coca-Cola officials. Miss Hannah Fletcher served the refreshments...Harris Photos"
TitMainTitle: Three men, including W. Beverly Carter, Jessie Vann, and Hannah Fletcher, standing at Coca-Cola booth in Syria Mosque for the 1956 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
CatSubject_tab: Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.Signs--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Advertising--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Syria Mosque (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Vann, Jessie, 1889-1967.
